title: Ortlieb’s New Versatile Quick-Lock System Adjusts to Rack Tube Diameter
content:
Germany’s Ortlieb is widely respected in the bike touring and bikepacking world. Their excellent Quick-Lock 2.1 and 3.1 systems are part of the reason why. The new Quick-Lock 2.2 system improves on the previous iteration with easier hook adjustments for different rack tube diameters. This adds to its already impressive versatility and eliminates the need for plastic shims. It also increases durability and brings more production in-house.

The Quick-Lock 2.2 system is available on Ortlieb’s Back-Roller Plus, Vario Plus 26L, and Vario Urban 20L. Check out more cool gear at the link below.
